page.title: 11Day in My Life - by a child
page.content:
...Sunday July 14 1985 ...
7.30am I got up and had a read for half an hour. The book was the Dandy. 8.00am My dad and brother came down- stairs. Dad made breadfast. We Frosties and toast and a cup of tea. 8.15am My dad and brother got changed and went to the ice-rink 8.25am I washed the pots and wiped them . 8.35am I had a wash and got changed. 9.00am Mum got up and made her break- fast. She had toast and a cup of tea. 9.10am Mum got a wash. Whilst she was doing this I got my trainers on and my PE shorts. 9.25 I set off for Bedford Field. 9.35am Mark, Alan, Andrew, Nicholas and I ran diagonally across the field, along the bankings and over the bridge.
